content:
{A打招呼}{test}Thanks! Let's play the rock-guessing game again sometime!
I like that rebellious side of yours, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>,
See ya, friend — Byne-byne!

{test}Bhan! Mmm, that smells amazing...
Having a friend like you, and getting to eat meat too,
Life's pretty sweet, bhan!
